summary.span: 告知 ASP.NET，[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 上執行的特殊應用程式設定為預先載入。

span.span: Notifies ASP.NET that a particular application that is running on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] is configured to be preloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作方法的介面。This method implements the method of the interface. [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 呼叫告知 ASP.NET 是否正在載入應用程式會支援預先載入的方法。calls the method to notify ASP.NET whether the application that is being loaded supports preloading. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只適用於執行的應用程式[!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)]。This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

exception.span: 執行個體，其中包含預載應用程式的資訊是 或空白。
